video.title: AngularJS tutorial: recipe box
video.description:
In this simple AngularJS tutorial, Eleftheria Batsou demonstrates how to code a recipe box.

See more from Eleftheria on her channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/EleftheriaBatsou

-

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Kannu
topLevelComment.text: I am unable to see the items i create on the screen :(

topLevelComment.author: Pooya
topLevelComment.text:
Angular.js with Bootstrap 3?
It should be Angular5 with Bootstrap 4

topLevelComment.author: Abhishek Pathak
topLevelComment.text:
Nice tutorial, Eleftheria. I am new to AngularJS and this was helpful.
Which version of Angular is that you are using? I have started with Angular 5, but it looks completely different...

replies.author: Moonbyte
replies.text:
angularjs is written in javaScript and angular 2 ... 5 is written in typescript.
if u are interested in angular 2+ check out mosh hamedani tutorial

replies.author: Eleftheria Batsou
replies.text: Abhishek Pathak hi! This is angularjs or sometimes we call it angular 1. For this project I am using the version 1.6. I am afraid I am not going to make soon a video in angular5. Thank you for your kind words :)

replies.author: Abhishek Pathak
replies.text: Can you make a video on latest Angular 5, if possible? I would highly appreciate your effort. Thank you.

topLevelComment.author: Duden - Travel Stories
topLevelComment.text: Who uses AngularJS anymore?! Totally useless when Angular 2 + is out there and so different from angularjs.

replies.author: DarkThrongRising
replies.text: Angular 2 is a nightmare, many people still use AngularJS. When A2 was released I went to Vue JS.

replies.author: Eleftheria Batsou
replies.text: dudeNigel many companies use angularjs, trust me :)

replies.author: Duden - Travel Stories
replies.text: yea, unless you are looking for a career in maintaining some old projects, people new to angular should not even care about angularjs

replies.author: M Fisch
replies.text: dudeNigel AngularJS is still used pretty often. Many people see it as a "stable version". Personally I would only recommend learning it to maintain/upgrade legacy applications, since it's outdated.

topLevelComment.author: George
topLevelComment.text: Please make some more videos. I really like the way you write code. Also, you have an angel like voice.

topLevelComment.author: Leon G
topLevelComment.text: Beautiful voice, hard to concentrate =) but I'm trying

replies.author: Eleftheria Batsou
replies.text:
I hope you ll concentrate soon :) 
Thank you

topLevelComment.author: Argee Learner
topLevelComment.text: Thanks, I can't wait to watch it. I was looking for good Angular videos
